full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL PADMA DBANG CHEN RTA MGRIN YANG GSANG KHROS PA'I DKYIL 'KHOR DU 'JUG CING DBANG BLANG BA'I CHO GA RIG 'DZIN NYER 'TSO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @033A *, ,(CES LHAG PA'I LHA MCHOG BCOM LDAN 'DAS PADMA DBANG CHEN RTA MGRIN YANG GSANG KHROS PA KHROS DKYIL 'KHOR DU BDAG NYID 'JUG CING DBANG BLANG BA'I CHO GA NYAMS SU BLANG BDE BAR BKOD PA RIG 'DZIN SROG GI NYER 'TSO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI GZHUNG LUGS RGYA MTSOR BLO GROS KYI SNANG BA YANGS PA'I RDO RJE'I SLOB MA RAB 'BYAMS SMRAS PA'I DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG 'OD @033B ZER SOGS DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN DON GNYER CAN DU MAS NAN TAN DU BSKUL BA'I NGOR, MKHAS GRUB GONG MA DAG GI LEGS BSHAD DANG PHYAG ZHES GSUNG RGYUN LA BRTEN NAS BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI BKA' 'BANGS KYI THA SHAL BA, ,DAM TSIG RDO RJES BRJOD BDE BKLAGS CHOG GI TSUL DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DPYOD LDAN DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG DAR RGYAS SO, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DRI MA MED PA 'DI DAG NAM YANG MI NUB CING PHYOGS DUS GNAS @034A *, ,SKABS THAMS CAD DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR BYED NUS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
